about_the_game:
Pinni and the Lost Voice


Pinni and the Lost Voice is a classic adventure platformer with a cute hand-drawn art style. Play as Pinni, a brave little doggy in a mysterious dreamland where the sun and the moon have stopped moving!

The Prologue


Pinni lives on a tiny planet where the day and night cycle are under the control of the Great Great Rooster, a powerful and magical bird that sits atop the highest tower of Hill Village.

The rooster sings every morning to let the sun pass and keep the cycle going.

Until one day, when the Great Great Rooster was ready to perform its daily cock-a-doodle-do, but suddenly it caught a sore throat and lost its beautiful voice! Now the sun and moon are stuck, and the world is split between an endless day and eternal darkness.

You must now embark on a great adventure in order to create a magical cough syrup to cure the Great Great Rooster’s sore throat and save the land from being stuck in time...

Gameplay


Pinni uses powerful barks to stun and parry attacks from the creatures who have been driven wild by the endless night and use his Bark Jump to scale mountains, climb trees, and explore new areas of your strange world.

Your journey will be full of quirky characters, exciting bosses, and many tricky challenges. Along the way, you must collect the necessary magical ingredients to create the mystical cough syrup in the hope of curing the Great Great Rooster's lost voice.

Note from the Developers


We want to create a pleasant and engaging experience with thrilling and memorable moments. As this is our second game, we can't wait to see where this journey will take us!

Let's make this Game Together!


To follow our progress and INFLUENCE this game, you can check out our Devlogs on Youtube or Chat with us Live on Twitch!




Disclaimer: We are in the very early production phase for this game.



Check out our previous game, Tadpole Tales on steam!

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
